New Records: Baltimore Orioles defeated Chicago White Sox 9-0, their second win in a row.
Chicago White Sox extended their losing streak to 12 consecutive games and 109 total losses in 2024.
Key Match Events: Chicago White Sox interim manager Grady Sizemore was ejected for the first time.
Baltimore Orioles' offensive showing included 9 runs by the second inning.
Pre-Game Insights: Baltimore Orioles had previously won the series opener 13-3.
Post-Match Reflections: Baltimore Orioles took the AL East lead with their win.
Chicago White Sox were on pace to finish 36-126 in 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Baltimore Orioles' Cedric Mullins and Anthony Santander contributed key hits.
Chicago White Sox struggled with pitching and defense.
